attributes.action: stop all non recyclable Plastics being used in the UK
attributes.additional_details:
A whopping 91% of plastic isn't recycled
Billions of tons of plastic have been made over the past decades, and much of it is becoming trash and litter, finds the first analysis of the issue.
attributes.background: thousands of Plastics are being shoved into landfills and not decomposing like the rest of the rubbish or even worse being dumped into our oceans
